articles.name: Inline *.exe attachment issues?
articles.title: Inline *.exe attachment issues?
articles.body:
This is going to test if inline attachments are allowed in help center:

 

Content URLs from Article Attachments endpoint:

https://wtp.zendesk.com/api/v2/help_center/articles/203709649/attachments

Broken

  • Inline: Inline test.exe attachment(/hc/article_attachments/201752435/test.exe)
  • Not Inline: Not Inline attachment test
  • Inline Picture Attachment: InfiniTunnel for Mac OS X

 Content URLs with locale added manually (en-us):

Working

  • Inline: Inline test.exe attachment(/hc/en-us/article_attachments/201752435/test.exe)
  • Not Inline: Not Inline attachment test
  • Inline Picture Attachment: InfiniTunnel for Mac OS X

Webservice name

Description

Dashlet in Nmbrs

Address_GetCurrent

Get the company's current address. 

Start, Algemeen, Informatie Bedrijf

Address_Insert

Insert the current company address. 

Start, Algemeen, Informatie Bedrijf

Address_Update 

Update the current company address. 

Start, Algemeen, Informatie Bedrijf

BankAccount_GetCurrent 

Get the company's current bankaccount. 

Start, Algemeen, Informatie Bedrijf

BankAccount_Insert 

Insert a company bankaccount. 

Start, Algemeen, Informatie Bedrijf

BankAccount_Update 

Update the current company bankaccount. 

Start, Algemeen, Informatie Bedrijf

Company_GetCurrentPeriod 

Returns the company's current period, Format = yyyy-pp-type, example: 2010-5-M or 2010-4-4W 

Huidige periode (not a dashlet, it's above the regular tabs)

CostCenter_GetList 

Returns kostenplaatsen that belong to a company 

Start, Salaris instellingen, Kostenplaatsen

CostCenter_Insert 

Update or insert a kostenplaats into a company 

Start, Salaris instellingen, Kostenplaatsen

DefaultEmployeeTemplates_GetByCompany

Returns all employee templates available for specified company

Wizard new employee (Default employee)

FileExplorer_UploadFile

Uploads document for company

Start, Tools, Bestandsbeheer

HourModel_GetHourCodes 

Returns hour codes that belong to a company's hour model 

Start, Salarisinstellingen, Salarisinstellingen

Journals_GetByRunCompany 

Returns the Journal XML

Takes year from active year of the company

Loonopdracht, Salarisdocumenten

Journals_GetByRunCompany_v2

Returns the Journal XML

Allow to supply the year to be used

Loonopdracht, Salarisdocumenten

Journals_GetByRunCostCenter 

Returns the Journal XML

Takes year from active year of the company

Loonopdracht, Salarisdocumenten

Journals_GetByRunCostCenter_v2

Returns the Journal XML

Allow to supply the year to be used

Loonopdracht, Salarisdocumenten

Journals_GetByRunDepartment 

Returns the Journal XML

Takes year from active year of the company

Loonopdracht, Salarisdocumenten

Journals_GetByRunDepartment_v2

Returns the Journal XML

Allow to supply the year to be used

Loonopdracht, Salarisdocumenten

Journals_GetByRunEmployee 

Returns the Journal XML

Takes year from active year of the company

Loonopdracht, Salarisdocumenten

Journals_GetByRunEmployee_v2 

Returns the Journal XML

Allow to supply the year to be used

Loonopdracht, Salarisdocumenten

List_GetAll 

Returns all companies 

-

List_GetByDebtor

Returns all companies by DebtorID

-

Reports_GetPayslipByRunCompany 

Get the run's payslips, takes year from active year of the company

Loonopdracht, Salarisdocumenten

Reports_GetPayslipByRunCompany_v2 

Get the run’s payslips

Allow to supply the year to be used

Loonopdracht, Salarisdocumenten

Reports_GetWageCodesByRunCompany

Returns all wage codes per run for specific company and specific run XML 

Takes year from active year of the company

Overzichten, Rapporten looncomponenten

Reports_GetWageCodesByRunCompany_v2

Returns all wage codes per run for specific company and specific run XML

Allow to supply the year to be used

Overzichten, Rapporten looncomponenten

Reports_GetWageCodesByYear 

Returns the Journal XML 

Overzichten, Rapporten looncomponenten

RunRequest_GetList 

Returns a list of requested runs with status for given company and year 

Global level, Run aanvraag

RunRequest_Insert 

Requests a run for given company 

Bedrijfsniveau, Loonopdracht, Run Aanvraag

Run_GetList 

Get the company's run list for a specified year 

Loonopdracht

SVW_GetCurrent 

Get the current SVW settings. 

Start, Salarisinstellingen, Svw Tabel

SVW_UpdateCurrent 

Update the current SVW settings. 

Start, Salarisinstellingen, Svw Tabel

SalaryDocuments_GetAllPayslipsPDFByRunCompany

Get all payslip PDF's of a company for a specific run period, takes year from active year of the company

 

SalaryDocuments_GetAllPayslipsPDFByRunCompany_v2

Get all payslip PDF's of a company for a specific run period

 

SalaryDocuments_GetEmployeePayslipsPDFByRunCompany

 

Get employee payslips in PDF by run company for a specific run period, takes year from active year of the company

 

SalaryDocuments_GetEmployeePayslipsPDFByRunCompany_v2

Get employee payslips in PDF by run company for a specific run period

 

SalaryTable_Get 

Returns a list of available schalen for the company salarytable 

Start, Salarisinstellingen, Salarisinstellingen

SalaryTable_GetScales 

Returns a list of available scales for the company salary table 

Start, Salarisinstellingen, Salarisinstellingen

SalaryTable_GetSteps 

Returns a list of available steps for the company salary table and selected scale 

Start, Salarisinstellingen, Salarisinstellingen

Schedule_GetCurrent 

Get the current company schedules. 

Kalender

WageComponentFixed_Get 

Get all vaste looncomponents for given period.

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageComponentFixed_GetCurrent 

Get all vaste looncomponents for the current period.

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageComponentFixed_Insert 

Insert a looncomponent to given period. If the period is before the company's current period, unprotected mode flag is required, else a TWK exception is thrown.

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageComponentFixed_InsertCurrent 

Insert a looncomponent to the current period.

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageComponentFixed_Insert_Batch 

Insert a batch of looncomponents to given period. If the period is before the company's current period, unprotected mode flag is required, else a TWK exception is thrown.

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageComponentFixed_Stop 

Stop a looncomponent ending after given period. If the period is before the company's current period, unprotected mode flag is required, else a TWK exception is thrown.

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageComponentVar_Clear 

Clear all variable looncomponents for given period.

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageComponentVar_ClearCurrent 

Clear all variable looncomponents for the current period.

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageComponentVar_Get 

Get all variable looncomponents for given period

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageComponentVar_GetCurrent 

Get all variable looncomponents for the current period.

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageComponentVar_Insert 

Insert a looncomponent to given period. If the period is before the company's current period, unprotected mode flag is required, else a TWK exception is thrown.

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageComponentVar_InsertCurrent 

Insert a looncomponent to the current period.

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageComponentVar_Insert_Batch 

Insert a batch of looncomponents to given period. If the period is before the company's current period, unprotected mode flag is required, else a TWK exception is thrown.

Bedrijf Looncomponenten

WageModel_GetWageCodes 

Returns wagec odes that belong to a company's wagemodel 

Start, Salarisinstellingen, Salarisinstellingen 

WageTax_GetList 

Returns wage taxes that belong to a company for a certain period and year

Loonaangifte

WageTax_GetXML 

Returns XML wage tax that belong to a company for a certain period and year

Loonaangifte

WageTax_SetSentExternal 

Set wage tax status to Sent as External

Loonaangifte

WorkCost_GetList Method

 

Returns all the list of wagecodes split by year

Werkkosten

WorkCost_Insert

Insert Werk Cost from financial administration in a specific period always with Wagecode 5670.

 

Werkkosten

BankAccount_Get Get bankaccount by Debtor ID. Instellingen, Informatie, Debiteur info
ContactPerson_Get Get contactperson by Debtor ID. Instellingen, Informatie, Contactpersoon
Debtor_Get Returns a debtor by ID.  -
Debtor_Insert Inserts a new debtor.  -
Debtor_Update Update an existing debtor.  -
Department_Delete Delete a department from a debtor Instellingen, HR Instellingen, Afdelingen
Department_GetList Returns departments that belong to a debtor Instellingen, HR Instellingen, Afdelingen
Department_Insert Insert a department into a debtor Instellingen, HR Instellingen, Afdelingen
Department_Update Update a department into a debtor Instellingen, HR Instellingen, Afdelingen
Function_Delete Delete a function from a debtor. Instellingen, HR Instellingen, Afdelingen
Function_GetList Returns functions that belong to a debtor. Instellingen, HR Instellingen, Afdelingen
Function_Insert Update or insert a function into a debtor. Instellingen, HR Instellingen, Afdelingen
Function_Update Update a function into a debtor. Instellingen, HR Instellingen, Afdelingen
List_GetAll  Returns all debtors. -
List_GetByNumber Returns all debtors with a certain number. -
ServiceLevel_Get Get servicelevel by Debtor ID.

 Facturatie, Service Level
Tags_Get Get tags by Debtor ID.

 Startpagina, Debiteur info

articles.name: Responsive tables on mobile??
articles.title: Responsive tables on mobile??
articles.body:
Zoomdata connects to a variety of data sources from Cloudera to Search to SQL-based databases and flat files ...

Each data connector has capabilities and limitations when connected to the Zoomdata Server. This quick reference article will highlight these details, which include:

  • The data source version that is supported (and tested) by Zoomdata, if applicable
  • Whether the following functionalities are supported:
    • distinct count
    • real time
    • microquery
    • SparkIt
    • multi-group by visuals
  • The types of calculations available - sum, average, min, max, last value and formulas

The capabilities and limitations are broken out into the following tables below:

Table 1 The data source version supported by Zoomdata.
Table 2
  • Distinct count support
  • Real time streaming support
  • MicroQuery
Table 3
  • SparkIt
  • Multi-group by visuals
Table 4 Calculation limits

Table 1: Data Sources Supported Version

Data Source

Tested/Supported Version

Amazon Kinesis

not applicable

1.0 +

  • Flat JSON
  • Flat XML
  • CSV, TSV files

not applicable
recommended file size is 200MB or less

articles.body:
HINWEIS:
Meist werden nicht 100% aller Gruppenmitglieder zum Auslesen angezeigt, so dass unsere Programme
circa 60-80% der Gruppenmitglieder aulesen können!

 

UNBEDINGT BEACHTEN bei Gruppen mit mehr als 5.000 Mitgliedern:

articles.name: For Your Eyes Only
articles.title: For Your Eyes Only
articles.body:
This topic was posted to the restricted Agents Only forum in your Zendesk and pinned to the home page. The topic is visible to agents only, not your customers.

The home page is the landing page for both agents and customers. It can be customized by administrators to e.g. include a search box, enabling users to easily find help in the forums.
